mathtools.greatest_power_of_two_less_equal¶

abjad.tools.mathtools.greatest_power_of_two_less_equal(n, i=0)¶

Return greatest integer power of two less than or equal to positive n.

abjad> for n in range(10, 20):
...     print '\t%s\t%s' % (n, mathtools.greatest_power_of_two_less_equal(n))
... 
   10 8
   11 8
   12 8
   13 8
   14 8
   15 8
   16 16
   17 16
   18 16
   19 16

When i = 1, return the next-to-greatest integer power of 2 less than or equal to n.

abjad> for n in range(10, 20):
...     print '\t%s\t%s' % (n, mathtools.greatest_power_of_two_less_equal(n, i = 1))
... 
   10 4
   11 4
   12 4
   13 4
   14 4
   15 4
   16 8
   17 8
   18 8
   19 8

When i = 2, return the next-to-next-to-greatest integer power of 2 less than or equal to n, and so on.

Raise TypeError on nonnumeric n:

abjad> mathtools.greatest_power_of_two_less_equal('foo')
TypeError

Raise ValueError on nonpositive n:

abjad> mathtools.greatest_power_of_two_less_equal(-1)
ValueError

mathtools.greatest_multiple_less_equal

mathtools.is_power_of_two
